hero.headline: Engineering without compromise.
hero.subhead: From silicon-carbide inverters to structural battery packs, every Nexus system is designed to waste less, last longer, and feel effortless on the road.
hero.hero_alt: Nexus performance coupe in studio lighting showcasing sleek silhouette.

powertrain.title: Dual-Motor AWD
points: Instant torque with millisecond torque split front/rear
Motor maps adapt to road temperature and tire load
High-efficiency windings reduce copper losses at cruise
powertrain.alt: Exploded view of Nexus e-axle and reduction gear

powertrain.title: Silicon-Carbide Inverters
points: SiC MOSFETs cut switching losses at high current
Liquid-cooled baseplate maintains output under repeated launches

powertrain.title: Active Torque Vectoring
points: Per-wheel torque commands stabilize the car mid-corner
Motors vector first, brakes second to keep rotors cool
Snow / Track / Auto modes tune yaw response
powertrain.alt: Chassis diagram showing left/right torque distribution

powertrain.title: Liquid Thermal Circuit
points: Single loop cools motors, inverters, and battery pack
Heat scavenged for cabin and battery pre-conditioning
High-flow path unlocks sustained track performance
powertrain.alt: Integrated thermal loop schematic with heat exchangers

highlights: Efficiency optimizer adds up to ~5% highway range in calm weather
